content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 2, Barcelona 4.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 2, Barcelona 4.
Foul by Tomás Pina (Mallorca).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Dudu Aouate.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez.
Substitution, Barcelona. Martín Montoya replaces Jordi Alba.
Foul by Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca).
Dani Alves (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Jordi Alba.
Substitution, Barcelona. Marc Bartra replaces Javier Mascherano.
Attempt missed. Xavi (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Substitution, Mallorca. Marc Fernández replaces Ximo Navarro.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tomás Pina (Mallorca).
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Alejandro Alfaro (Mallorca).
Foul by Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona).
Geromel (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Geromel (Mallorca).
Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Mallorca. Andreu Fontàs replaces Martí.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Alejandro Alfaro (Mallorca).
Goal!  Mallorca 2, Barcelona 4. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Jordi Alba.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Ximo Navarro.
Substitution, Barcelona. Alexis Sánchez replaces David Villa.
Foul by Tomás Pina (Mallorca).
Xavi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Xavi (Barcelona).
Alejandro Alfaro (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Mallorca 2, Barcelona 3. Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Penalty conceded by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Gerard Piqué (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Foul by Michael Pereira (Mallorca).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Mallorca 1, Barcelona 3. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Víctor Casadesús.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Cesc Fàbregas.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Jordi Alba.
Offside, Mallorca. Víctor Casadesús tries a through ball, but Alejandro Alfaro is caught offside.
Second Half begins Mallorca 0, Barcelona 3.
Substitution, Mallorca. Alejandro Alfaro replaces Tomer Hemed.
First Half ends, Mallorca 0, Barcelona 3.
Goal!  Mallorca 0, Barcelona 3. Cristian Tello (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Goal!  Mallorca 0, Barcelona 2. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergio Busquets.
Attempt blocked. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Dani Alves (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro Bigas (Mallorca).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) because of an injury.

Foul by Pedro Bigas (Mallorca).

Goal!  Mallorca 0, Barcelona 1. Xavi (Barcelona) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
